mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, squater, sale FROM (SELECT squater, sale FROM quarter_sales ORDER BY squater DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY squater
SELECT ROWNUM, sdate, sale FROM (SELECT sdate, sale FROM daily_sales ORDER BY sdate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 7
SELECT sdate, sale, brand FROM brand_sales
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_sales (sdate, sale) VALUES (sysdate-1, (SELECT nvl(sum(nvl(p.price,0)),0) sale FROM payment p, morder o WHERE o.order_id = p.order_id AND o.order_date > sysdate - 1 ) )
INSERT INTO brand_sales (SELECT sysdate-1, od.brand, nvl(sum(od.price),0) sale FROM order_detail od, morder o WHERE o.order_id = od.order_id AND o.order_date > sysdate - 1 GROUP BY brand )
